overview:
Andrew is a sales and marketing specialist.

He has experience working in all areas of advertising, including traditional and new media and has lent his talents to a number of tech companies, startup and the big boys alike. He enjoys working with passionate entrepreneurs and serving as a problem solver.

Andrew was born and raised in southern New England in a small business family, which he likes to cite as inspiration for his work today. He attended college in Vermont, where he honed his skills and participated in campus activities and societies, including a two-term stint as the President of the student body. He is currently pursuing his graduate education.
